name: convict
description: Featureful configuration management library for Node.js (nested structure, schema validation, etc.)

scripts.test:coverage: istanbul cover --print none --report none --include-pid _mocha -- --check-leaks test/*-tests.js && istanbul report text-summary lcov
scripts.test:ci: istanbul cover --print none --report none --include-pid _mocha -- --check-leaks test/*-tests.js && istanbul report text-summary lcov && cat test/coverage/lcov.info | coveralls
